CustomField.description: Uncontrollable attrition = Term/mergers, and Transitions for reason of company closing or ownership/leadership change.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Transition_Type__c , "Termination/Merger"),TRUE, IF(ISPICKVAL(Transition_Type__c, "Termination") && ISPICKVAL(Transition_Reason__c, "Company Closing"), TRUE, IF(ISPICKVAL(Transition_Type__c, "Termination") && ISPICKVAL(Transition_Reason__c, "Ownership/Leadership Change"), TRUE, IF(ISPICKVAL(Transition_Reason__c, "Company Acquired - Merged with Another Plan"), TRUE, IF(ISPICKVAL(Transition_Reason__c, "Features Not Offered"), TRUE, FALSE)))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Uncontrollable attrition = Term/mergers, and Transitions for reason of company closing or ownership/leadership change.
CustomField.label: Uncontrollable
